CustomField.formula:
Case( Installation_Team__c ,
"Palmetto Team 1", 0.70 * System_Size_Calculated_kW__c * 1000,
"Palmetto Team 2", 0.70 * System_Size_Calculated_kW__c * 1000,
"Palmetto Team 3", 0.70 * System_Size_Calculated_kW__c * 1000,
"Guardian", 0.45 * System_Size_Calculated_kW__c * 1000,
"Devlin", 0.75 * System_Size_Calculated_kW__c * 1000,
"FirstLight NJ", 0.75 * System_Size_Calculated_kW__c * 1000,
"Skyline Solar", 0.75 * System_Size_Calculated_kW__c * 1000,
0)
CustomField.label: Installation Pricing
